roleset.name: reject, spurn
roleset.note: REBUFF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rebuff' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. (from rebuff.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: nice easy transitive
example.text: McGill, a Valparaiso, Ind., ball-bearing manufacturer, had rebuffed BroadBeach's proposal.
example.arg: McGill, a Valparaiso, Ind., ball-bearing manufacturer,
